metadata.description: Comprehensive timeline for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857
metadata.changes: Rebuilt timeline from events data with evidence references

2017-07-26.evidence: JF1 - Shopify Plus email (THE FORENSIC TIME CAPSULE)
2017-07-26.significance: Irrefutable proof of Kayla's role and Daniel's involvement

2025-05-22.event: Kayla Pretorius Death & Shopify Audit Trail Destruction
2025-05-22.evidence: SF6 (Kayla estate docs), JF1 (preserved Shopify evidence)
2025-05-22.significance: Dual critical event: death triggers appropriation, evidence destruction attempt

2025-05-23.significance: Immediate response to evidence destruction (day after)

2025-06-20.evidence: SF2A - Sage Control User Access screenshot
2025-06-20.significance: Proves Rynette has access to Peter's email (Pete@regima.com) and can impersonate him

2025-07-23.significance: Rynette Farrar identified as subscription owner - controls access to accounting system

2025-08-25.event: Sage Expiry Screenshot - Over 1 Month Without Access
2025-08-25.significance: Account expired 23 July, still expired 25 August (over 1 month denial of access)

2025-10-23.significance: Formal demand for R60.2M + $150K payment with 48-hour deadline

2026-05-01_to_2027-04-30.significance: First year call option window - R18,685,000 payment if exercised

2027-05-01_to_2029-04-30.significance: Second year call option window - R23,165,000 payment if exercised

2029-05-01_to_2029-04-30.significance: Final year call option window - R28,730,000 payment if exercised

2023-07-01.event: Start of Revenue Processing Period - 8 Shopify Stores
2023-07-01.significance: Beginning of 27-month period where R60.2M revenue processed but not paid over

2025-10-25.event: Payment Deadline Expiry - R63M Demand Ignored
2025-10-25.significance: Peter/RWW failed to respond to formal demand, triggering escalation

timeline_events.title: First ReZonance Invoice to RST
timeline_events.description: First invoice from ReZonance to RegimA Skin Treatments for Google GSuite services (R250.80), marking the beginning of business relationship

timeline_events.title: ReZonance Service Expansion
timeline_events.description: Major service expansion with multiple enterprise services (R100,000+), substantial increase in service provision and financial exposure

timeline_events.title: Financial Year Commencement RST/SLG
timeline_events.description: Financial year commencement for RegimA Skin Treatments and Strategic Logistics, beginning of period covered by trial balance evidence

timeline_events.title: Financial Year Commencement Villa Via
timeline_events.description: Villa Via operates on different financial year, creating complexity in group reporting and enabling profit extraction concealment

timeline_events.title: Multiple Adjusting Journal Entries
timeline_events.description: Significant inter-company cost reallocations: RWW R500K stock provision write-back, RWW R810K admin fee reallocation, SLG R252K admin fee reallocation, SLG R80K production cost transfer to RST
Multiple adjusting journal entries across entities for inter-company cost reallocations

timeline_events.title: Year-End Adjustments and Interest Payment
timeline_events.description: SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement, RST advances R750K loan to RWW for production costs, Directors' fee adjustment R784K in RST
SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement

timeline_events.title: Villa Via Year-End Profit Extraction
timeline_events.description: Villa Via generates R4.4M monthly rental income with R3.7M profit, Members loan account R22.8M indicating systematic capital extraction
Villa Via financial year-end showing R3.7M profit and R22.8M members loan

timeline_events.title: Bantjies Trial Balance Email Distribution
timeline_events.description: Email from Danie Bantjies with final trial balances to Bernadine Wright, Jax, Peter, Rynette, Daniel for financial statement finalization meeting
Bantjies sends trial balance email to finalize financial statements

timeline_events.title: Bantjies Sends Trial Balance Email to Bernadine Wright
timeline_events.description: Bantjies sends trial balance email to Bernadine Wright for financial statement finalization meeting, demonstrating his control over financial systems and accounting records

timeline_events.title: Adderory Companies Registration - Pre-Planning Phase
timeline_events.description: Rynette's son registered Adderory (Pty) Ltd and Adderory Skin (Pty) Ltd, establishing competing business infrastructure 4 years before fraud escalation. Demonstrates long-term conspiracy planning.

timeline_events.title: ReZonance Opening Balance Debt
timeline_events.description: Opening balance showing substantial accumulated debt to ReZonance (R971,587.93), evidence of unpaid services over extended period

timeline_events.title: First Structured Payment to ReZonance
timeline_events.description: First structured payment to ReZonance (R40,000), attempt to manage debt through partial payments

timeline_events.title: Kayla Pretorius Murder
timeline_events.description: Murder of Kayla Pretorius, creating estate complications, law enforcement investigation, and family trauma. Estate includes ReZonance debt of R1,035,000.

timeline_events.title: ReZonance Final Balance Persistent Debt
timeline_events.description: Final balance showing persistent debt to ReZonance (R1,035,361.34) despite payment claims, debt continues to grow

timeline_events.title: False Payment Claim #1 to ReZonance
timeline_events.description: RegimA claims payment of R470,000 to ReZonance not reflected in ReZonance records, first documented false payment claim

timeline_events.title: False Payment Claim #2 to ReZonance
timeline_events.description: Additional false payment claims totaling R765,361.34 to ReZonance, escalation of fraudulent payment claims

timeline_events.title: Rynette Makes R1M+ Debt to ReZonance 'Disappear'
timeline_events.description: Rynette fraudulently eliminates over R1M debt owed by RegimA Skin Treatments to ReZonance by misallocating international GoDaddy payments as though they were local payments made to ReZonance. ReZonance never received these payments; amounts remain outstanding.

timeline_events.title: Pete and Rynette Attempt Unauthorized Banking Changes
timeline_events.description: Over the past year, bank contacts Daniel multiple times to ask for approval where Pete and Rynette attempted to draft mandates to change ownership structure, close Daniel's accounts, and cancel his cards - all without his knowledge or consent. Daniel informs bank these are errors and tells Pete/Rynette to cease immediately.

timeline_events.title: Chantal Letter - Kayla Estate Finalization
timeline_events.description: Chantal delivered letter mentioning Kayla estate finalization, indicating ongoing exploitation of deceased victim's estate.

timeline_events.title: Chantal Delivers Letter About Kayla Estate Finalization
timeline_events.description: Chantal delivers letter to office regarding Kayla estate finalization, indicating ongoing exploitation of deceased victim's estate

timeline_events.title: R900,000 Unauthorized Transfers from RegimA SA
timeline_events.description: Peter made unauthorized transfers of R900,000 from RegimA SA without Daniel's authority as co-director

timeline_events.title: R5.2M SLG Stock Missing & Large Invoice
timeline_events.description: R5.2M SLG stock missing with simultaneous R5.2M invoice from SLG to RST. Stock physically disappeared, same type later supplied by Adderory to RegimA. Systematic asset stripping begins.

timeline_events.title: RegimA SA Revenue Diversion Started
timeline_events.description: Diversion of revenue streams from RegimA SA initiated, marking the beginning of systematic revenue hijacking

timeline_events.title: R5.4M Stock Disappears from Strategic Logistics
timeline_events.description: R5.4M worth of stock physically disappears from Strategic Logistics warehouse. Represents 46% of annual sales, 10x historical adjustment rate. Same stock type later supplied by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) to RegimA.

timeline_events.title: Trust Structure Establishment
timeline_events.description: Foundation for R2.85M+ trust violations established through trust structure manipulation

timeline_events.title: R5.4M Stock Adjustment Processed Without Investigation
timeline_events.description: R5.4M written off as simple 'stock adjustment' without investigation, supporting documentation, or proper authorization. Bantjies as accountant should have investigated 46% loss but did not, demonstrating complicity.

timeline_events.title: Two Years Unallocated Expenses Dumped
timeline_events.description: Rynette and Peter dumped two years' worth of unallocated expenses from all companies into RegimA Worldwide and pressured Daniel to sign off within 12 hours for SARS VAT & Annual Accounts. Daniel used time until June 6th to finalize reports and uncover fraud.

timeline_events.title: Payment Redirection Scheme
timeline_events.description: Part of R4.28M+ financial diversions. Payments redirected from platform owned/paid by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK)

timeline_events.title: Bank Account Change Letter for RegimA Worldwide
timeline_events.description: Setup for R3.14M+ revenue theft. First documented act in coordinated scheme. Attempted redirect of payments from Dan's UK-funded infrastructure

timeline_events.title: Cloud IT Systems Removal Order
timeline_events.description: Peter ordered Cloud IT systems removal, seizing infrastructure control from legitimate operators.

timeline_events.title: Peter Orders Cloud IT Systems Removal
timeline_events.description: Peter instructs removal of all cloud IT systems, systematic dismantling of cloud-based infrastructure as preparation for evidence destruction

timeline_events.title: Server Missing from Office
timeline_events.description: Physical server hardware disappears from office premises, potential evidence destruction or data harvesting in preparation for subsequent financial crimes

timeline_events.title: Unauthorized Beneficiary Changes
timeline_events.description: Exclusion of legitimate beneficiaries. Direct violation of trust obligations and beneficiary rights

timeline_events.title: Jacqui Confronts Rynette About R1,035,000 Debt
timeline_events.description: Jacqui confronted Rynette regarding R1,035,000 owed by RegimA Skin Treatments to Rezonance since Feb 2023. Jacqui stated these funds were part of Kayla's estate and keeping them would be profiting from proceeds of murder.

timeline_events.title: Unauthorized Transfers (R850K+)
timeline_events.description: R850,000+ unauthorized transfers. Direct evidence of financial authority abuse and theft. R850K+ included revenue from platform paid by UK company (28 months)
Jax confronts Rynette about R1,035,000 owed to ReZonance and Kayla's estate

timeline_events.title: Shopify Audit Trail Hijacking
timeline_events.description: CRITICAL EVENT: R1M+ monthly revenue â†’ R0 (100% business shutdown). Central evidence destruction event proving consciousness of guilt. Destruction of audit trails for platform owned, paid, operated by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK) since July 2023 - proves RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream. Orders removed from Shopify following Jacqui's confrontation.

timeline_events.title: Domain Registration (Identity Fraud)
timeline_events.description: Customer hijacking platform. Family conspiracy escalation and digital impersonation. Domain registered to impersonate business on Dan's UK-funded platform. New domain regimaskin.co.za registered by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) following Shopify shutdown.

timeline_events.title: Daniel Finalizes Fraud Reports
timeline_events.description: Daniel finalized reports uncovering fraud after using time from March 30 deadline extension

timeline_events.title: Daniel Sends Comprehensive Reports to Bantjies
timeline_events.description: Daniel sends comprehensive documentation to Bantjies including listing of all companies, Shopify store operations, and preliminary reports, demonstrating full transparency

timeline_events.title: Secret Card Cancellations
timeline_events.description: Secret cancellation of cards to sabotage Daniel's ability to pay creditors. Rynette may have opened 8 ABSA accounts using Daniel's stolen card.

timeline_events.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
timeline_events.description: CRITICAL EVENT: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after Daniel exposed Villa Via fraud. Audit would have discovered R5.4M stock adjustment fraud and systematic inter-company manipulation. Demonstrates consciousness of guilt and protection of fraud scheme.

timeline_events.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
timeline_events.description: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after fraud exposure (June 6), demonstrating consciousness of guilt and conflict of interest given R18.685M debt to trust
Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after fraud exposure

timeline_events.title: Bantjies Learns of Criminal Matters
timeline_events.description: Daniel reports to Bantjies about Kayla's murder (August 2023) and Peter stealing funds after murder, including over R1.8M owed to Rezonance. Bantjies acquires knowledge of criminal matters before signing confirmatory affidavit.

timeline_events.title: Bantjes Email: R10M Decline and Computer Expense Analysis
timeline_events.description: Danie Bantjes sends email acknowledging his '30-odd year involvement with the Faucitt family business' and confirming the RegimA Group made its first-ever substantial trading loss with a R10M year-on-year bank balance decline. Notes computer expenses exceed 20% of revenue.

timeline_events.title: Daniel's Comprehensive 26-Point Response to Bantjes
timeline_events.description: Daniel sends detailed response documenting: (1) Kayla's murder Aug 2023 and card expiry, (2) ReZonance R1.8M director loan, (3) Rynette's unauthorized control of all accounts, (4) Pete/Rynette breaking automations despite warning, (5) Unauthorized banking changes, (6) Rynette making R1M+ debt disappear through fraudulent allocation, (7) Accounts exist only on Rynette's computer, (8) Pattern of theft (Kachan precedent), (9) Need for urgent internal audit.

timeline_events.title: Systematic Trust Violations
timeline_events.description: Trustee misconduct and self-dealing. Clear evidence of trustee misconduct and self-dealing

timeline_events.title: Email Impersonation Pattern and Domain Switch Instruction
timeline_events.description: R3.1M+ losses enabled by email control. Pattern of impersonation supporting criminal conspiracy charges. Email control facilitated fraud related to platform paid by Dan's UK company since July 2023. Email from Gee in Aug explained to Jax that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email'.

timeline_events.title: Domain Switch Email Instruction
timeline_events.description: Gee instructed to send email: 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email', active customer diversion to fraudulent domain owned by Adderory

timeline_events.title: Coordinated Fund Diversions
timeline_events.description: Complex financial flow manipulation. Evidence of sophisticated financial crime coordination. Fund diversions targeted revenue from infrastructure continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd

timeline_events.title: Warehouse POPI Violations
timeline_events.description: Complete operational shutdown. Documented evidence of systematic business destruction. Shutdown of operations for platform continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd (28 months)

timeline_events.title: POPIA Violation Notice Sent to Pete
timeline_events.description: Daniel sends formal legal notice to Pete regarding POPIA violation. Discovered Pete had instructed staff to use new system only accessible to him and Rynette, redirected revenue streams such that audit trail disappeared.

timeline_events.title: Account Manipulation
timeline_events.description: Financial control seizure. Documented evidence of financial system abuse and unauthorized control. Control seized over accounts receiving Shopify revenue from Dan's UK-paid platform

timeline_events.title: Sage Accounting System Expires - Rynette Controls Reactivation
timeline_events.description: RegimA Worldwide Distribution's Sage accounting registration expires. Rynette Farrar is the subscription owner and only she can reactivate. System shows message: 'Your Accounting registration expired on 23/07/2025. You will no longer be able to access your company data in Accounting.'

timeline_events.title: Trust Asset Misappropriation
timeline_events.description: Trust property theft. Documented theft of trust property and breach of fiduciary duty

timeline_events.title: Trust Breach Evidence
timeline_events.description: Complete compromise of trust integrity. Systematic evidence of ongoing trust law violations

timeline_events.title: Settlement Agreement Signed
timeline_events.description: Settlement agreement signed 2 days before interdict filing, demonstrating strategic coordination and timing to create leverage
Bantjies certifies Peter's affidavit as Commissioner of Oaths despite material omissions

timeline_events.title: Peter Files Founding Affidavit with Material Non-Disclosures
timeline_events.description: Peter files founding affidavit containing material non-disclosures and perjury regarding email control, filed 2 days after settlement agreement

timeline_events.title: Gee Email Explaining Domain Switch Instruction
timeline_events.description: Email from Gee to Jax explaining that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email' on June 20, 2025. Confirms customer hijacking scheme.

timeline_events.title: Financial Evidence Concealment
timeline_events.description: Cover-up operations demonstrating guilt. Consciousness of guilt through evidence destruction attempts. Cover-up attempt to conceal fact that RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream - all revenue from Dan's UK-funded Shopify platform

timeline_events.title: ENS Africa Acknowledges Criminal Matters Then Suppresses
timeline_events.description: ENS Africa acknowledges receipt of criminal matters information with 'Received, thanks Daniel' email, then suppresses this information from Court

timeline_events.title: Daniel Forwards Sage Evidence to Lawyer
timeline_events.description: Daniel forwards Sage screenshots to lawyer (smunga@ensafrica.com) showing Rynette using Pete@regima.com email account. Includes screenshots from June 20 and August 25, 2025.

timeline_events.title: Accounts Emptied
timeline_events.description: Accounts emptied, potentially because Daniel was still managing to pay creditors despite 6 months of sabotage

timeline_events.title: Application 3 Dismissed by Court
timeline_events.description: Application 3 (Contact Interdict against Jacqueline Faucitt) dismissed by court. Peter Faucitt's third application unsuccessful.

timeline_events.title: Rynette Farrar Retains Legal Counsel
timeline_events.description: Rynette Farrar retains Elliott Attorneys to represent her interests and pursue defamation counterclaim strategy against allegations made in Jacqueline's answering affidavit.

timeline_events.title: Letter of Demand Issued (Defamation)
timeline_events.description: Elliott Attorneys issues Letter of Demand (KL0034) on behalf of Rynette Farrar demanding retraction, apology, and cease and desist from defamatory allegations made in Jacqueline's answering affidavit. 48-hour deadline imposed.

timeline_events.title: Ongoing Interdict Violations Reported
timeline_events.description: Elliott Attorneys reports that Peter has 'once again, removed the work phone' from staff at common home, preventing stock handling. Potential contempt of court violation of initial interdict order.
